txt.en: You have been tasked with thwarting the efforts of foes dwelling in the village of Cotfast.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Radhril for your reward!

'Would you accompany me on a mission, [placeholder]?

'The Free Peoples in the Wildwood have reported nothing but troubles from the village of Cotfast that lies within. There are reports of provisions being stolen and forest creatures being captured.

'If the Wildwood is to ever be peaceful, the problems in the village of Cotfast will need to be resolved.'
Within the Wildwood sits the village of Cotfast, a home to rogues and villains.\n\nYour mission is to thwart the efforts of foes dwelling in the village of Cotfast.
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Your mission is to thwart the efforts of foes dwelling in the village of Cotfast.\n\nSpeak to Radhril.
'We have done well, [placeholder]. While the village of Cotfast still stands, perhaps they now understand that their evil ways bear consequence in the Wildwood.'
